name: Double Screen
description:
Change the number of the screen to solve the puzzle. Double the screen then you can get double keys, but be aware that you will use double keys to open the door in double screen!

Controls:

Move: Arrows ↑↓←→ 
Reset Level: R
Change Screen: WSAD
(Is limited at the begin)

Exit Game: Esc
Change Level: Numpad "+" / "-"

BGM, SE: (C)PANICPUMPKIN
